query.statement:
INSERT INTO SAPHEE.ZCST219 ( MANDT ,YYYYMM ,SID ,PJT ,HNO ,PST ,REMARK ,ERDAT ,ERZZT ,ERNAM ,RQDATE ,RQTIME ,RQID ,GNO ,KUNNR_NM ,DOCTYPE ,CASE_FLAG
) VALUES ( #G_MANDT# ,#YYYYMM# ,#SID# ,#PJT# ,#HNO# ,#PST# ,#REMARK# ,HEX(CURRENT DATE) ,HEX(CURRENT TIME) ,#G_USER_ID# ,HEX(CURRENT DATE) ,HEX(CURRENT TIME) ,#G_USER_ID# ,#GNO# ,#KUNNR_NM# ,#DOCTYPE# ,#CASE_FLAG# )
